name: Army Vehicle Military Base Driving Simulation
name_original: Army Vehicle Military Base Driving Simulation
description:
Army Vehicle Driving simulator , as the game suggests, offers the chance to enjoy driving the vehicles used by the military. The vehicles range from humvee to giant apc vehicles.

The game offers 10 different levels in which the player has to go through the checkpoints within the given time. Each vehicle has different speed and stability so you might want to unlock them to check out which one is the fastest.

The game also features a "coin mode" in which you have unlimited time to collect coins scattered all over the map. Each coin you pick will give you 50 in game coins. There are a total of 100 coins scattered on the map making it worth 5000 coins which is the price of the fastest vehicle in the game.

so you can start the game with the coin mode so that you can unlock the best vehicle to complete your levels.

The game is featured in a huge wasteland where probably was an old army base camp before. The huge wasteland has an area of 2 kilometers square in real world scale. The terrain is mix of desert , dirt and mountains .

The game offers stunningly beautiful graphics and realistic vehicle physics to enjoy. you can also set the graphics detail according to your device specifications.
